attributes.action: The complete dismantlement of the legal system.
attributes.additional_details:
We also advise that the removal of capitalism as the dominant social structure, should be implemented immediately. In addition, borders should probably be reconsidered, to the point of non-existence. 

Finally, we call for the mass repurposing of The Rich, as toilet-roll based art installations.

Sincerely,
The People

(Useful resource in case you get stuck)
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anarchist_communism
attributes.background:
Theresa May,

We, the people call for the complete dismantlement of the legal system, the government, the prisons and the gender binary.
